input_text: LU Factuality: U.S. Congressman Arrives in Iraq for Landmark Visit BAGHDAD, April 16 (Xinhua) --
target_text: (Arrives, true); (Visit, true)

input_text: LU Factuality: U.S. Congressman Tony Hall arrived here Sunday evening, becoming the first U.S. lawmaker to visit Iraq since the 1991 Gulf War.
target_text: (arrived, true); (becoming, true); (to visit, true)

input_text: LU Factuality: Hall, heading a three-member delegation, arrived here at 19:17 (1517 GMT) by land from Jordanian capital Amman, and stayed at the five-star Mansour Hotel.
target_text: (heading, true); (arrived, true); (stayed, true)

input_text: LU Factuality: At the entrance of the Mansour Hotel, Hall made a brief statement, saying that he came to Iraq because he has heard for a long time about the humanitarian situation here, especially the malnutrition among the Iraqi children and the increasing mortality rate of the children and the elderly.
target_text: (made, true); (statement, true); (saying, true); (came, false); (increasing, false); (malnutrition, false); (humanitarian situation, false); (heard, false); (mortality rate, false)

input_text: LU Factuality: He also said that his visit will mainly focus on the humanitarian situation of Iraq, which has been under crippling U.N. sanctions since its 1990 invasion of Kuwait, the primacord of the 1991 Gulf War.
target_text: (said, true); (visit, true); (been under, true); (U.N. sanctions, true); (primacord, true); (invasion, true); (focus on, false)

input_text: LU Factuality: "The visit is not a political visit, it is a visit of humanitarian concerns," he added.
target_text: (added, true); (political visit, false); (visit, false); (is not, false); (visit of humanitarian concerns, false); (is, false)

input_text: LU Factuality: "There are a lot of issues I want to take a look at, but the issue of humanitarian concerns is number one," he said.
target_text: (said, true); (lot of issues, false); (are, false); (issue of humanitarian concerns, false); (look at, false); (want, false); (is, false); (number one, false); (to take, unknown)

input_text: LU Factuality: During his stay in Iraq, he will visit several places, including hospitals and schools, in Baghdad and southern Iraq, where the U.S. and Britain imposed a no-fly zone, with the claimed aim of protecting Shi'ite Muslims from possible attacks by Iraqi government.
target_text: (including, true); (stay, true); (no-fly zone, true); (imposed, true); (protecting, false); (attacks, false); (claimed, false); (aim, false); (visit, false)

input_text: LU Factuality: Bombing targets in the no-fly zones in southern and northern Iraq by U.S. and British warplanes have almost become a daily occurrence, causing serious civilian casualties.
target_text: (no-fly zones, true); (Bombing, true); (become, true); (warplanes, true); (causing, true); (daily occurrence, true); (civilian casualties, true)

input_text: LU Factuality: When asked by Xinhua if there is any plan for him to meet Iraq officials, he said "I have not been asked to meet any top Iraqi officials.
target_text: (asked, true); (said, true); (is, false); (plan, false); (to meet, false); (not been asked, false); (to meet, false)

input_text: LU Factuality: My concern is with the Red Cross, the (Iraqi) Red Crescent, to see what they have to show me, to see with my own eyes and make up my own mind."
target_text: (have, false); (concern, false); (make up, unknown); (to show, unknown); (to see, unknown)

input_text: LU Factuality: However, it has been reported that Hall is expected to meet Iraqi Health Minister Umid Medhat Mubarak and representatives of all international aid organizations working in Iraq.
target_text: (is expected, true); (working, true); (been reported, true); (to meet, false)

input_text: LU Factuality: Iraq has claimed that more than 1.5 million people, mostly children and the elderly, have died of curable diseases due to the decade-long U.N. sanctions.
target_text: (claimed, true); (died, false); (diseases, false); (U.N. sanctions, false)

input_text: LU Factuality: Iraq has accused the U.S., which vehemently opposes the lifting of the sanctions against Iraq, of using the sanctions as a tool to contain the Iraqi regime headed by President Saddam Hussein.
target_text: (opposes, true); (sanctions, true); (accused, true); (headed by, true); (using, false); (sanctions, true); (to contain, unknown)

input_text: LU Factuality: Earlier this year, some 70 U.S. congressmen sent a letter to U.S. President Bill Clinton, calling for an end to the humanitarian crisis in Iraq by having the sanctions lifted.
target_text: (letter, true); (calling, true); (sent, true); (having, true); (end, true); (humanitarian crisis, true); (lifted, false); (sanctions, true)

Inauguration of free zone in Dubai for e-commerce
target_text: (Inauguration, true)

input_text: LU Factuality: Dubai 10-28 (FP) - Dubai's Crown Prince Sheikh Mohamed Bin Rashid Al Maktoum inaugurated a free zone for e-commerce today, called Dubai Internet City.
target_text: (inaugurated, true)

input_text: LU Factuality: The preliminary stages of the project, the only one of its kind according to its designers, are estimated at $200 million.
target_text: (project, true); (according to, true); (estimated at, true)

input_text: LU Factuality: Sheikh Mohamed, who is also the Defense Minister of the United Arab Emirates, announced at the inauguration ceremony that "we want to make Dubai a new trading center."
target_text: (is, true); (Defense Minister of the United Arab Emirates, true); (announced, true); (inauguration ceremony, true); (want, false); (to make, unknown)

input_text: LU Factuality: The minister, who has his own website, also said: "I want Dubai to be the best place in the world for state-of-the-art technology companies."
target_text: (has, true); (own website, true); (said, true); (want, false); (to be the best place, unknown)

input_text: LU Factuality: He said companies engaged in e-commerce would be able to set up offices, employ staff and own equipment in the open zone, including fully-owned foreign companies.
target_text: (said, true); (would, false); (including, false); (engaged in, false); (to set up, false); (be able, unknown); (own, false); (employ, false)

input_text: LU Factuality: The e-commerce free zone is situated in north Dubai, near the industrial free zone in Jebel Ali, the top regional and tenth international leading area in container transit.
target_text: (situated in, true)

input_text: LU Factuality: The inauguration of Dubai Internet City coincides with the opening of an annual IT show in Dubai, the Gulf Information Technology Exhibition (Gitex), the biggest in the Middle East.
target_text: (inauguration, true); (coincides, true); (annual IT show, true); (opening, true)
